pages.text: 36|71|Ware ga tezukara kare-ra no tame ni tsukutta kachiku o kare-ra ni shoyu sa sete iru no o minai no ka.
36|72|Ware wa, sore o kare-ra (no yo) ni fukusa seta. Sorede, kare-ra wa kore ni nori, soshite taberu.
36|73|Mata kare-ra wa (sono soto ni mo) iroiro sore o riyo shi, mata nomimono o eru. Soredemo kare-ra wa kansha shinai no ka.
36|74|Kare-ra wa, arra no soto ni jashin o erabi nantoka tasuke rareyou to suru.
36|75|Sorera (jashin-tachi) wa, kare-ra o tasukeru chikara wa naku, mushiro kare-ra no kata ga jashin o mamoru tame gunbi o totonoete iru shimatsu.
36|76|Anata wa kare-ra no iu koto de, kanashinde wa naranai. Hontoni ware wa, kare-ra no kakusu koto mo gen wasu koto mo shitte iru.
36|77|Ningen wa kangaenai no ka. Ware wa 一精滴 Kara kare o tsukuttade wanai ka. Sorenanoni miyo, kare wa kozen to ha mukatte iru.
36|78|Mata kare wa, ware ni nazoraeru mono o hikiai ni dashite, jibun no sozo o wasure, iu. `Dare ga, kuchihateta hone o ikikaera semashou ka.'
36|79|Itte yaru ga i. `Saisho ni o tsukuri ni natta kata ga, kare-ra o ikikaera seru. Kare wa subete no hi zobutsu o shiri tsukushite ora reru.
36|80|Midori no ki kara, anata gata no tame ni hi o tsukura reta no mo karedeari, dakarakoso anata gata wa sore ni yotte moyasu.'
36|81|Ten to ji o sozo nasa reta kare ga, kore ni ruisuru mono o tsukuri enaidearou ka. Iya, kare wa saiko no sozo-shadeari, zenchi de ara reru.
36|82|Nanika o nozoma reru to, kare ga `are.' To o meiji ni nareba, sunawachi aru.
36|83|Kare ni koso subete no sho san'are. Sono o te de ban'yu o togyo nasa reru okata, anata gata wa kare no omoto ni kisa reru nodearu.
